mapper.sql: SELECT FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1') TXT_ANICODE_1, MDI_LINKNO, COUNT (DISTINCT DECODE (C.DAIO_IOTYPE, 1, MAI_ANICLSCODE)) CNT_CLS, SUM (DECODE (C.DAIO_IOTYPE, 1, 1, 0)) CNT_ANI, COUNT ( DISTINCT (CASE WHEN B.RENTEDATE >= B.SCH_DAY THEN MAI_ANICLSCODE END) ) CNT_BOYUK_CLS, SUM(CASE WHEN B.RENTEDATE >= B.SCH_DAY THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_BOYUK_ANI, COUNT ( DISTINCT (CASE WHEN B.RENTDATE >= B.SCH_DAY THEN MAI_ANICLSCODE END) ) CNT_RENT_CLS, SUM(CASE WHEN B.RENTDATE >= B.SCH_DAY THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_RENT_ANI FROM MF_ANI_INFO A, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_VVRM_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO, MF_DPT_INFO, DT_ANI_IO C, ( SELECT DAIO_ANICODE, T.SCH_DAY, MAX(CASE WHEN DAIO_IOTYPE = '1' AND DAIO_BOYUKSTS = 'Y' AND DAIO_IODATE <= SCH_DAY AND DAIO_RENTEDATE >= DAIO_IODATE THEN DAIO_RENTEDATE END) AS RENTEDATE, MAX(CASE WHEN DAIO_IOTYPE = '2' AND DAIO_RESN = '8' AND DAIO_IODATE <= SCH_DAY AND DAIO_RENTEDATE >= DAIO_IODATE THEN DAIO_RENTEDATE END) AS RENTDATE, MAX(CASE WHEN NOT (DAIO_IOTYPE = '2' AND DAIO_RESN = '1') THEN DAIO_IODATE END) AS DATE1 FROM DT_ANI_IO ,( SELECT DECODE(#{sch_type},'B',BASE_DAY,'D',PREV_DAY,'M',PREV_MONTH, 'Y',PREV_YEAR) SCH_DAY FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE ( #{cal_1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BASE_DAY ,TO_DATE ( #{cal_1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')- 1 AS PREV_DAY ,ADD_MONTHS(#{cal_1},- 1) AS PREV_MONTH ,ADD_MONTHS(#{cal_1},- 12) AS PREV_YEAR FROM DUAL ) ) T GROUP BY DAIO_ANICODE, T.SCH_DAY) B WHERE MAI_ANICODE = B.DAIO_ANICODE AND MAI_ANICLSCODE = MAC_ANICLSCODE AND MAI_VVRMNO = MVI_VVRMNO AND A.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND B.DAIO_ANICODE = C.DAIO_ANICODE AND B.DATE1 = C.DAIO_IODATE AND (MAI_DETHTYPE = '1' OR MAI_DETHTYPE = '2' AND NOT MAI_DETHDATE <= B.SCH_DAY) AND MVI_TEAMNO = MTI_TEAMNO AND MTI_DPTNO = MDI_LINKNO AND MDI_LINKNO IN ('6112588' --'동물기획과', ,'6113719' --'동물복지1과', ,'6113720' --'동물복지2과', ,'6113721' --'종보전연구실' ) GROUP BY FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1'), MDI_LINKNO ORDER BY FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1'), MDI_LINKNO

SELECT MDI_DPTNAME, MTI_TEAMNAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1') TXT_ANICODE_1, MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE, DAIO_IOTYPE, FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('200', '202', MAI_SEX) TXT_MAI_SEX, DECODE (DAIO_IOTYPE, 1, FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('200', '251', DAIO_RESN), FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('200', '252', DAIO_RESN)) TXT_DAIO_RESN FROM MF_ANI_INFO A, MF_ANI_CLS, DT_ANI_IO, MF_TEAM_INFO, MF_DPT_INFO, MF_VVRM_INFO WHERE MAI_ANICLSCODE = MAC_ANICLSCODE AND MAI_ANICODE = DAIO_ANICODE AND A.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MAI_VVRMNO = MVI_VVRMNO AND MVI_TEAMNO = MTI_TEAMNO AND MTI_DPTNO = MDI_LINKNO AND TO_CHAR (DAIO_IODATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{cal_1} AND MDI_LINKNO IN ('6112588' --'동물기획과', ,'6113719' --'동물복지1과', ,'6113720' --'동물복지2과', ,'6113721' --'종보전연구실' ) GROUP BY MDI_DPTNAME, MTI_TEAMNAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1'), MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE, DAIO_IOTYPE, MAI_SEX, DECODE (DAIO_IOTYPE, 1, FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('200', '251', DAIO_RESN), FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('200', '252', DAIO_RESN)) ORDER BY MDI_DPTNAME, MTI_TEAMNAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1'), MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE

SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT MAI_ANICLSCODE) CNT_ANICLS_KNJP, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{cal_1}), 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"' ) TXT_SCH_DATE FROM MF_ANI_INFO A, MF_ANI_CLS, ( SELECT DAIO_ANICODE, MAX(CASE WHEN NOT (DAIO_IOTYPE = '2' AND DAIO_RESN = '1') THEN DAIO_IODATE END) AS DATE1 FROM DT_ANI_IO WHERE DAIO_IODATE <= TO_DATE (#{cal_1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY DAIO_ANICODE ) B, DT_ANI_IO C WHERE MAI_ANICLSCODE = MAC_ANICLSCODE AND MAI_ANICODE = B.DAIO_ANICODE AND A.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND (MAI_DETHTYPE = '1' OR MAI_DETHTYPE = '2' AND NOT MAI_DETHDATE <= TO_DATE (#{cal_1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND B.DAIO_ANICODE = C.DAIO_ANICODE AND B.DATE1 = C.DAIO_IODATE AND C.DAIO_IOTYPE = '1' AND MAI_KNJPTYPE = '2'
